attributes.action: Regulate Veterinary Pricing and Improve Oversight of Veterinary Practices in UK
attributes.additional_details: We askParliament to introduce legislation that regulates veterinary pricing structures, requires clear cost transparency, and strengthens oversight of veterinary malpractice to protect UK pet owners and pets, and accessible complaint procedures
attributes.background: Vet bills are rising at an unsustainable rate, leaving many pet owners unable to afford treatments.we are also witnessing serious failures in care from misdiagnoses to neglect ,with little recourse available to owners. The current system lacks price transparency,adequate regulatory enforcement.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar action: 

Regulate veterinary practices to help make them more affordable
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705499

Create a new independent regulatory body for vets
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717434

Owners to be able to claim compensation for pet suffering due to vet negligence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722985
